name: The Youtuber
description:
"As you come to a dangerous city,full of people who could be your enemies and your friends,will you be able to achieve all your dreams?Remember,you're not the one who accomplishes something in this little game,you're just the one who contols the protagonist who is yet to be revealed.Will you challenge yourself to beat the quiz and unlock the competitive multiplayer mode?Will you only complete the quiz and finish the game?Will you dive in to the story mode and meet me?Will you dig so deep in the lore that you'll try that quiz even if you can't finish it,just so you find out more about my story?The choice is yours."-No name

For now,only the demo is available to play.In the demo you can only play the quiz and mini games.Might as well find some secrets ;)

Full game coming out this year.
